name: Memory Lane (itch) (benpence)
description:
Memory Lane

Your child self calls out to you for help from your past. What happened then determines who you are now.

Help yourself by guiding them through the labyrinth of your childhood...

You will encounter difficult situations out there. Make sure you choose and use the right strategy to attack...

Some people report the web version of the game does not work on Firefox/Safari. Please try Chrome if it does not work.

Controls
  • Move / Attack 
    ←  ↑ →
    A W D
  • Choose Strategy
    1 2 3 4 5

Sorry, no controller support.

The Game

The game was built in Unity3D 2019.4 and wow was that a steep learning curve from making games with React.

In the future, I would like to balance it a bit better and add sound and more content.

This is my first original game. Thank you in advance to anyone who plays it. Critical feedback welcome 加油！

v1.0-jam-deadline

Game version submitted before the Game Jam deadline
